title: Delightful is thy first gift of Heaven

verses.text: Delightful is thy first gift of Heaven To man, of Eden then possessed, Jehovah's rest-day, kindly given, That all his creatures might be blessed.
Memorial of creation's King, We welcome now thy glad return; And while thy name we join to sing, Our hearts with love and rapture burn.
We bless thy name, almighty Lord, We love the keepsake thou hast given; Our voices rise with one accord, To praise thy holy gift of Heaven.
All praise to Jesus, by whose blood We are redeemed from sin and death; Give glory to the Son of God, Praise him with every living breath.
By sin we are opposed to wrath; In sin died for us, he that lives, Our wandering feet to virtue's path, Where we may keep God's holy law.
O that law shall ever be our delight, The holy Sabbath be our rest; And when we gain that world so bright, All flesh shall keep it with the blest.
